job_details.Vacaturetitel: Azure DevOps (Platform) Engineer With Focus On AI
job_details.Functieomschrijving:
Azure DevOps (Platform) Engineer with Focus on AI IT
     * Hybride
     * Utrecht
     * Nederland
     * 36 uur
     * Fulltime, includes Azure Data & AI Services, Azure DevOps, Python, Git but we would really like our candidate to also have skills in popular Rabobank technologies like Kotlin, Java, Cloud Foundry (CF), Kong API, Spring Boot, YAPL pipelines, etc., * Experiment, develop, and debug various AI applications.
     * Design and build CI/CD pipelines according to Rabobank requirements.
     * Monitor and ensure the functionality of programs across testing, development, and production environments.
     * Work with software engineers, data engineers, and data scientists to refine and enhance software solutions.
     * Continuously update your knowledge on development tools, programming techniques, and emerging technologies.
     * Write efficient, testable, and well-documented code.
     * Maintain and support software functionality.
     * Act as a subject matter expert in AI compliance
job_details.full_text:
Azure DevOps (Platform) Engineer With Focus On AI

Azure DevOps (Platform) Engineer with Focus on AI IT
     * Hybride
     * Utrecht
     * Nederland
     * 36 uur
     * Fulltime, includes Azure Data & AI Services, Azure DevOps, Python, Git but we would really like our candidate to also have skills in popular Rabobank technologies like Kotlin, Java, Cloud Foundry (CF), Kong API, Spring Boot, YAPL pipelines, etc., * Experiment, develop, and debug various AI applications.
     * Design and build CI/CD pipelines according to Rabobank requirements.
     * Monitor and ensure the functionality of programs across testing, development, and production environments.
     * Work with software engineers, data engineers, and data scientists to refine and enhance software solutions.
     * Continuously update your knowledge on development tools, programming techniques, and emerging technologies.
     * Write efficient, testable, and well-documented code.
     * Maintain and support software functionality.
     * Act as a subject matter expert in AI compliance

profile_classification.rationale: The role emphasizes building and maintaining CI/CD pipelines for AI applications, monitoring programs across environments, and working with data engineers and scientists. While it mentions AI, the core focus on platform engineering, DevOps, and supporting existing software solutions aligns more closely with an ML Engineer's operational and productionization responsibilities.

job_tasks.task: Experiment, develop, and debug various AI applications.
job_tasks.justification: This phrase directly relates to the development and refinement of AI applications, which falls under the core modeling activities.

job_tasks.task: Design and build CI/CD pipelines according to Rabobank requirements.
job_tasks.justification: Designing and building CI/CD pipelines is a fundamental aspect of MLOps, ensuring automated deployment and integration of applications.

job_tasks.task: Monitor and ensure the functionality of programs across testing, development, and production environments.
job_tasks.justification: Monitoring program functionality across different environments is a key responsibility in maintaining production-grade systems, a core tenet of MLOps.

job_tasks.task: Work with software engineers, data engineers, and data scientists to refine and enhance software solutions.
job_tasks.justification: This highlights the need to collaborate with various technical teams to improve software, indicating strong communication and teamwork skills.

job_tasks.task: Continuously update your knowledge on development tools, programming techniques, and emerging technologies.
job_tasks.justification: This explicitly states the requirement for continuous learning and adaptation to new technologies, a key soft skill in the tech industry.

job_tasks.task: Write efficient, testable, and well-documented code.
job_tasks.justification: Writing code with specific qualities like efficiency, testability, and documentation is a core software development practice.
Maintaining and supporting existing software is a common responsibility within software development roles, especially in production environments.

job_tasks.task: Act as a subject matter expert in AI compliance
job_tasks.justification: Understanding and ensuring compliance with AI regulations requires a grasp of the business context and legal/ethical frameworks surrounding AI.

soft_skills.skill: Work with software engineers, data engineers, and data scientists
Continuously update your knowledge on development tools, programming techniques, and emerging technologies.
Write efficient, testable, and well-documented code.
Act as a subject matter expert in AI compliance
